Class CacheMap

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map, org.apache.commons.collections.BoundedMap, org.apache.commons.collections.IterableMap, org.apache.commons.collections.OrderedMap
Deprecated. Use org.apache.commons.collections.map.LRUMap 

public class CacheMap
extends org.apache.commons.collections.map.LRUMap

A map with a maximum capacity. When the map is full, the oldest entry is removed.

See Also:
Serialized Form
